name: openAi
description: APIs for sampling from and fine-tuning language models
subtitle: ={{ $parameter["operation"] }}

options.name: Answers the specified question using the provided documents and examples.  The endpoint first [searches](/docs/api-refer...
options.action: Answers the specified question using the provided documents and examples.  The endpoint first [searches](/docs/api-refer...

options.name: Transcribes audio into the input language
options.action: Transcribes audio into the input language

options.name: Translates audio into into English
options.action: Translates audio into into English

options.name: Creates a completion for the chat message
options.action: Creates a completion for the chat message

options.action: Classifies the specified `query` using provided examples.  The endpoint first [searches](/docs/api-reference/searches) o...

options.name: Creates a completion for the provided prompt and parameters
options.action: Creates a completion for the provided prompt and parameters

options.name: Creates a new edit for the provided input, instruction, and parameters
options.action: Creates a new edit for the provided input, instruction, and parameters

options.name: Creates an embedding vector representing the input text
options.action: Creates an embedding vector representing the input text

options.action: Lists the currently available (non-finetuned) models, and provides basic information about each one such as the owner an...

options.name: Retrieves a model instance, providing basic information about it such as the owner and availability
options.action: Retrieves a model instance, providing basic information about it such as the owner and availability

options.action: The search endpoint computes similarity scores between provided query and documents. Documents can be passed directly to...

options.action: Upload a file that contains document(s) to be used across various endpoints/features. Currently, the size of all the fil...

options.name: Delete a file
options.action: Delete a file

options.name: Returns information about a specific file
options.action: Returns information about a specific file

options.name: Returns the contents of the specified file
options.action: Returns the contents of the specified file

options.name: List your organization's fine-tuning jobs
options.action: List your organization's fine-tuning jobs

options.name: Creates a job that fine-tunes a specified model from a given dataset.  Response includes details of the enqueued job inc...
options.action: Creates a job that fine-tunes a specified model from a given dataset.  Response includes details of the enqueued job inc...

options.name: Gets info about the fine-tune job.  [Learn more about Fine-tuning](/docs/guides/fine-tuning)
options.action: Gets info about the fine-tune job.  [Learn more about Fine-tuning](/docs/guides/fine-tuning)

options.name: Immediately cancel a fine-tune job.
options.action: Immediately cancel a fine-tune job.

options.name: Get fine-grained status updates for a fine-tune job.
options.action: Get fine-grained status updates for a fine-tune job.

options.name: Creates an edited or extended image given an original image and a prompt
options.action: Creates an edited or extended image given an original image and a prompt

options.name: Creates an image given a prompt
options.action: Creates an image given a prompt

options.name: Creates a variation of a given image
options.action: Creates a variation of a given image

options.name: Lists the currently available models, and provides basic information about each one such as the owner and availability
options.action: Lists the currently available models, and provides basic information about each one such as the owner and availability

options.name: Delete a fine-tuned model. You must have the Owner role in your organization
options.action: Delete a fine-tuned model. You must have the Owner role in your organization

options.action: Retrieves a model instance, providing basic information about the model such as the owner and permissioning

options.name: Classifies if text violates OpenAI's Content Policy
options.action: Classifies if text violates OpenAI's Content Policy
